title: API Reference
description: The following sections outlines the API of discord_cli.py.

properties.name: discord_cli.__version__
properties.description: A string representation of the version. This is based off PEP 440.

classes.name: Command_System
classes.description: The command system is a class which is used to generate and execute a set of commands.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the command system. The name should only contain alphabetic characters and underscores.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A description of the command system. Usually explaining the perpose of the commands it contains.

properties.name: commands
properties.description: A list of the commands at the first level of the command system.

properties.name: command_count
properties.description: The amount of commands at the first level of the command system.

methods.name: command
methods.description: Adds a command to the first level of the command system and returns it.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the command. The name should only contain alphabetic characters and underscores.

parameters.name: function
parameters.description: The function executed when the command is called.

returns.description: The command added to the command system.

methods.name: tree_string
methods.description: Gets a string representation of the whole command system tree.

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: When true, shows the arguments, options, tags and permissions of the commands.

returns.description: The string representation of the command system.

parameters.name: client
parameters.description: The discord client for the bot application.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The discord message which envoked the command.

parameters.name: command_string
parameters.description: The command string to parse and execute.

parameters.name: *argv
parameters.description: Any extra arguments which you wish to be passed to the command function.

parameters.name: **kwargs
parameters.description: Any extra keyword arguments which you wish to be passed to the command function.

returns.description: The value returned by the command function. If the execution failed, the return of the execution error callback is returned instead.

methods.name: usage_message
methods.description: Gets a string representation of the command, it's usage and it's sub commands.

parameters.name: client
parameters.description: The discord client for the bot application.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The discord message which envoked the command.

parameters.name: command_string
parameters.description: The command string which identifies the command to get the usage message for.

returns.description: The string representation of the usage message.

methods.name: set_execution_error_callback
methods.description: Sets which function is to be called when there is an error when parsing a command.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The function to be called upon error.
